text:
I dunno if it's just because Supra has said that ACE did both soundtracks, but I get the same feel from this track as from some of the tracks in Xenoblade Chronicles. More so than some of the other Emil Chronicle-tracks that's been uploaded in the playlist. 

...maybe it's just me, though.
author: LordMyoo

text: A perfect theme for this deserted comments section. So cold...

text: 1 person MISSED the like button n_n Thank you for sharing this theme SupraDarky, i didn't know it existed :)

text: What a nice soothing and atmospheric song, Gabe.  I hope you had a great Christmas.

text: Haven't heard of this game myself. Another MMO that had a great OST was WonderKing. It's a shame that got taken down.Â

author: Jirt

text: A great ambient dungeon theme. One of my favorite soundtracks and I've never even played this game. With this and Xenoblade, I'm a huge fan of ACE+. I'm sure the music in X on the Wii U will be great, but part of me wishes they would return and be in charge of its soundtrack.
author: SupraDarky

text:
You never know. They might.
After all, I'm pretty sure Xenoblade advertised with Yoko Shimomuras name in the music section, yet she only actually made a few tracks.
author: OmegaMetroid93

text: Yeah, some even told me that Yasunori Mitsuda did the entirety of Xenoblade, even though he was the composer for the ending track only.
author: Topazd

text: X's soundtrack is being made by Hiroyuki Sawano. He's pretty good too.
author: Gyro
